column2: FEMA has opened several Disaster Recovery Centers in Texas. Look at how it is helping the Mission community. https://t.co/upyfmcCzN4
A Disaster Recovery Center has been opened to assist those who have been impacted by the #CarrFire in Shasta County: 2685 Hilltop Drive, Redding, 7 days a week, 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. @femaregion9
